feyen-etal-2023-pragmatic.title: Pragmatic Annotation of Articles Related to Police Brutality
feyen-etal-2023-pragmatic.author:
Feyen, Tess  and
Mari, Alda  and
Portner, Paul
feyen-etal-2023-pragmatic.paperMotivationText: The research goal is to determine whether the use of moral adjectives and their appearance in context changes depending on the political orientation of the journal.
feyen-etal-2023-pragmatic.paperContributionText: A dataset consisting of newspaper articles annotated with categories from an ontology that takes into account various actors involved in events surrounding police brutality.
feyen-etal-2023-pragmatic.paperResultsText: No results yet, work in progress (paper mainly describes the ongoing annotation task and gives examples)
feyen-etal-2023-pragmatic.dataDomainOtherText: newspaper articles on the George Floyd and Adama Traoré cases
